reference.title: New domains
reference.shortdesc: DITA 2.0 adds domains for alternative titles and emphasis elements (em and strong)

section.title: Alternative titles domain
section.p: DITA 2.0 generalizes the concept of alternative titles as represented by the 1.x base element types navtitle and searchtitle into the new base element type titlealt. The alternative titles domain uses the new titlealt element to define navtitle and searchtitle as specializations. It also adds the new specializations linktitle and subtitle.

section.title: Emphasis domain
section.p: The emphasis domain defines DITA versions of the HTML em (emphasis) and strong elements. Both elements are specializations of ph. These elements have the same semantics as the HTML elements. They serve as an alternative to the elements in the highlight domain.
